Approximately how long will the palmer bunk beds with storage and stairs be back ordered? Can you give me an estimate of how long before they would be delivered?

Gardner White: Thank you for your interest in the Palmer Brown Twin Stair Bunk Bed: https://gw.attn.tv/aD6QC6MbxUpS
I'm afraid I can't confirm how long the delay would be. We have a wide delivery area across Michigan. We deliver to our regular delivery area 7 days a week, and other select areas on specific days of the week. If you live outside of our delivery area then we usually ship via UPS or FedEx and once shipped, it will take 7-10 business days to receive your order. Oversized items may take longer, 14-21 business days.
I have a question about white glove delivery
Gardner White: White Glove Delivery places your order in the room of your choice, fully assembled, with packaging removed. It starts at $149.99 and is free with mattresses starting at $699.

We will be purchasing a living room set, a bedroom set and a bunk bed set. The bunk bed is on back order. Would the price for white glove delivery be for all items if the bunk beds come later? We will need everything else delivered right away and don't want to wait for the bunk beds

Gardner White: Great question! If you order them at the same time, the price of the delivery should be applicable to all. However, just to be sure, I'll double-check this with my team for you. I'll update you as soon as I hear back. Please hang tight!
Thank you
Gardner White: My pleasure! Have a good day!
